website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ MX525, a budget XGA-resolution data projector, offers good brightness and solid data-image quality.

customer_reviews.title: Small purchase to improve your life
customer_reviews.text: I've had this projector since July 2015 and it's still going strong. I use it in my living room instead of a TV, so it gets used almost everyday for at least several hours. I bought it on a whim and it has greatly surpassed my expectations. I have it projecting directly on my wall (no screen) and connected to an amazon fire box and a nice speaker. It really makes everything more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy A

customer_reviews.title: Works great in direct light
customer_reviews.text: Works great in direct light. Nice and bright. Quiet fan. When I was setting it up it wasn't a plug and play intuitive setup. You will have to click on the source and choose which outlet you are using, ie. Computer 1, Computer 2...Once you do that your image will be displayed. However, it isn't able to search for the source automatically. Will update once we have used for our business meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This projector has been nothing but a delight. the image is super clear and extremely bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my church which has a lot of light. This projector has been nothing but a delight. the image is super clear and extremely bright, the only thing that would have made it better is if the sound would have been a little better. Running the sound through the projector i get a slight hum.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome projector for an affordable price. Great quality. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We use this projector occasionally for presenting photographs. It works great with MacBooks. I can't comment on how it would hold up under daily use.
customer_reviews.author: svcace

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed with the focusing mechanism
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed with the focusing mechanism. Its kind of hard to position the projector to fit my screen. I guess I can't ask for more for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: yiu-keung lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is really crisp and clear! Very nice and not too big or too small. We mounted ours on our ceiling and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: It blew my mind how crisp and clear it looks. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right now it's great but it look a little slanted in some pic
customer_reviews.author: DJPAPO

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Projector
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent, and it was very easy to set up the projector. The power cable was too short considering that it was a ceiling installation. I had to find a longer power cable and swap it out. I wish it could zoom in a little more as I was using it for a relatively short throw in a classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great projector.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in both moderate and very dark environments! I am very satisfied with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity and a great
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I had hoped for in the price range. Excellent clarity and a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mick G

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Only reason its a 4 is because ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Only reason its a 4 is because mounting it to the ceiling was a little more difficult due to the design.
customer_reviews.author: BDUBBS

customer_reviews.title: Great product.....love it
customer_reviews.text: Using it,since 2 months.....i must say its really gud projector......its not full hd.....but still its very clear...ya if u compare with led tv..u will get dissappointed little bit...as led has more sharpness nd contrast...but still for the price its osam......best colors in presentation mode....
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

product_meta.title: BenQ DLP Video Projector - XGA Display, 3200 Lumens, HDMI, 13,000:1 Contrast, 3D-Ready Projector (MX525)
product_meta.description: Featuring a XGA resolution, a brightness of 3200 ANSI lumens, a contrast ratio of 13000:1, and an unbelievable lamp life of up to 10,000 hours, the MX525 is the perfect projector choice for your everyday life. Whether it's in business, education, or at home, the MX525 delivers stunning images and lower total cost of ownership!
feature_bullets: DLP OFFICE PROJECTOR: With a bright 3200 ANSI lumens display, XGA resolution, and remarkable 13,000:1 contrast ratio, the eco-friendly BenQ MX525 beams magnificent presentations with sharp, crystal-clear images and incredible color accuracy and shadow details in small to medium size rooms
LONG LASTING DLP PROJECTOR: Up to 10,000 Hours Long Lamp Life
ENERGY EFFICIENT PROJECTOR: Uses only 0.5W power in standby mode, and with SmartEco Power Saving Technology, power consumption is kept to a minimum
PORTABLE BUSINESS PROJECTOR: Small form-factor and a variety of connection options, including HDMI and VGA x2, the MX525 is perfect for professionals who are always on the go.
RELIABLE BRAND: BenQ is the #1 best-selling DLP projector brand worldwide with 1 year warranty for parts and labor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
